select MS_BERTH.MS_BERTH_ID , MS_BERTH.BERTH_CODE , MS_BERTH.BERTH_NAME , MS_BERTH.MS_KICHI_ID , MS_BERTH.DELETE_FLAG , MS_BERTH.USER_KEY , MS_BERTH.VESSEL_ID , MS_BERTH.DATA_NO , MS_BERTH.SEND_FLAG , MS_BERTH.RENEW_DATE , MS_BERTH.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_BERTH.TS, MS_KICHI.KICHI_NAME
from MS_BERTH left join MS_KICHI on MS_KICHI.MS_KICHI_ID = MS_BERTH.MS_KICHI_ID where (MS_BERTH.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_BERTH.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)
and MS_BERTH.BERTH_CODE like :BERTH_CODE and MS_BERTH.BERTH_NAME like :BERTH_NAME

INSERT INTO MS_BERTH ( MS_BERTH_ID , BERTH_CODE , BERTH_NAME , MS_KICHI_ID , DELETE_FLAG , USER_KEY , VESSEL_ID , SEND_FLAG , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID ) VALUES ( :MS_BERTH_ID , :BERTH_CODE, :BERTH_NAME , :MS_KICHI_ID, :DELETE_FLAG , :USER_KEY , :VESSEL_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_BERTH SET BERTH_CODE = :BERTH_CODE, BERTH_NAME = :BERTH_NAME , MS_KICHI_ID = :MS_KICHI_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE MS_BERTH_ID = :MS_BERTH_ID AND TS = :TS
